title: Project Senior Manager
company_description:
FIT HUB is a venture-backed Health & Wellness Startup in Indonesia with the mission to democratize access to Health & Wellness for all Indonesians. Through our digital innovation in integrating wellness services and products into an easily accessible platform, FIT HUB is able to enhance people's lives with an affordable and premium one-stop solution.

Our digital ecosystem allows members to conveniently connect with other users, discover the best pre-recorded and live workouts, search for nearby gyms, book classes and coaches. In addition, members have unlimited access for classes and training in our Gyms at 10+ cities.

Currently FIT HUB has more than 15,000 members and aims to reach 100,000 members and open 50 offline locations by 2022 to be the biggest Health & Wellness brand in Indonesia. Join our growing team and unleash your greatest potential to revolutionize the Health & Wellness sector through technology.

Our Investors include: Global Founders Capital, Goodwater Capital and Trihill Capital.
about_the_job:

Prepare and control the project budget, construction schedule, project reporting, progress assessment, and project execution plan to ensure the budgets meet the operational needs and requirements
Plan the whole project management, including preliminary club interior designs, setting timelines, prioritizing tasks, and assigning duties and responsibilities to the team members to ensure the project aspects (timing, quality, finance) are well managed. 
Review, monitor & evaluate the internal manpower requirement & performance

title: B2B Business Development
company_description: Natuno is a design & innovation company based in Jakarta that offers expertise in digital product and experience design. Our Team of Designers, developers, researchers, and product teams will always help you to reach the utmost business and product potentials.
about_the_job:
Responsibilities

Be the face of Natuno Consulting's business and client relations program. We are seeking a seasoned Senior Account Executive that can help us reach more clients and lead our sales organization. If you're passionate about the world of digital design and looking for an opportunity to drive business growth, we invite you to apply!

Client Relationship Management: Manage existing client accounts, strengthen these relationships by ensuring client satisfaction, and look for upselling opportunities.
Business Development: Actively look for, engage with, and secure new business opportunities to grow Natuno's client base. Conduct market research and optimize the efficiency of sales strategies.
Client Outreach:
Clearly communicate the product, value, and offerings by Natuno that aims to solve the clients problems.
Implement strategies to turn prospects into leads, eventually customers
Collaborate with design and strategy teams to prepare, create proposals and presentations
Understand client needs and effectively communicate the value of our UI/UX design services
Guardian of Sales Organization: Monitor and safeguard the achievement of sales targets, ensuring that objectives are met consistently.
Stay Updated on Industry Trends: Keep up with the latest industry trends, new technologies, and best practices to give the best advice to clients.
Represent Natuno: Attend important conferences, workshops, and networking events as Natuno's representative to increase our brand presence.
Improve Internal Processes: Work with other teams within the company to improve processes, enhance client experiences, and make the sales process more efficient. Implement and leverage state-of-the-art sales and/or CRM tools and technologies to drive efficiency and success in achieving sales goals.

Requirements

Proven track record in B2B sales, preferably in the digital design or technology industry with a minimum of 3 years of work experience
Skilled in presenting and pitching ideas effectively, with strong communication and presentation skills. Capable of articulating complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.
Proficiency in using CRM software to manage leads, opportunities, and sales activities. Self-motivated and target-driven, with a passion for achieving and exceeding sales goals
Are a strategic thinker with an ability to identify and act on new opportunities
Exceptional problem-solving and negotiation skills
Have an understanding of the digital product design space is a plusw
Fluency in English, both verbal and written
Are motivated by challenges and a desire to drive growth in a fast-paced environment.
Demonstrated ability to build relationships and close deals with clients at various levels within organizations
Can foster and maintain strong relationships with clients and internal teams alike
Have the ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously
Strong attention to detail, especially in terms of analysis, writing, and communication

title: Strategic Presales
company_description:
PT. Metrodata Electronics Tbk, known as Metrodata Group, is the leading information communication technology (ICT) companies in Indonesia. On 14 February 1990, Metrodata Group launched its Initial Public Offering on the Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX ‚Äì MTDL) to raise funds for investment and working capital as well to allow public participation in its development and growth.

With more than 40 years of experience in ICT, Metrodata Group has accompanied its customers as they‚Äôve grown their business. Our professional employees continue to develop new innovations and ready to be challenges with the new era. We offer solutions in 8 areas: Cloud Services, Digital Business Platform, Big Data, Security, Business Application, Hybrid IT infrastructure, Consulting & Advisory Services, and Managed services. PT Metrodata Electronics Tbk has also been certified ISO 9001:2015.

As prove, Metrodata Group has received number of awards and recognitions for its accomplishments including Forbes 50 Best of Companies 2020, Investor Award Best Listed Companies 2020: Electronics Sector, Warta Ekonomi Magazine: Living Legend Company - Leading ICT Integrator Company, 2019.

We believes that a solid and customer satisfaction oriented team is the key to achieve ultimate success. To fulfill that commitment, we invite you, highly commitment professional to explore and be part of our team.
about_the_job:

A Presales consultant works with potential clients or customers to ensure they have a strong understanding of the services and/or products provided.

Presales Consultant Roles And Responsibilities Include

Delivering presentations and demonstrations to prospective and current clients
Liaising with those developing products/services to gain an in-depth knowledge that you can relate to customers ‚Äì and to let them in on user behavior and/or any potential changes clients would like
Helping the sales team to reach targets
Conducting research into the industry ‚Äì including competitor research
Encouraging clients to buy extras, upgrades etc.
Potentially considering new markets or clients to contact, based on your knowledge of both the products/services and their users.

Requirements

PT Metrodata Electronic, would like to invite you to be part of the company to develop yourself and your skills. If you are:

Minimum Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
Minimum 2 years experiences within Presales/ Sales Engineer
Preferably have experience in Infrastructure or Cloud or Application
You possess strong problem solving and prioritization skills
You have strong presentation skills
You have excellent interpersonal and communication skills and are adept at working with multiple stakeholders

If you meet the requirement we needed, let‚Äôs apply for the following open positions. Metrodata not just offer for the job, we offer you for brighter career future.

title: Enterprise Sales Manager - Global Data Center Company
company_description:
Welcome to the Michael Page global company profile.

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

While size has its advantages, it doesn't define us - the nature of our organic growth means that each new office is integrated into the region that it serves. It also means that as an employer looking to hire, or as a candidate aiming to grow your career you have the best of both worlds; a team that understands the market and geography you operate in, plus the resources and expertise of an international network at your disposal.

Our teams are broken down to focus on industry, assignment type, salary level and location, so your hiring requirements or job search will all be handled by a specialist who knows your sector inside-out. We are confident that our expertise can add value to your recruitment or job search process ‚Äì get in touch to find out more.
about_the_job:
Become part of a reputable Commercial Team|Showcase your enterprise sales skills in a thriving sector


About Our Client

Our client is a globally reputable Data Center company with presence across the region. Currently they are looking for an Enterprise Sales Manager to join their world-class commercial team, working very closely with senior management team within local and regional team.

Job Description

Responsibilities:

Build, nurture and maintain relationships with international and local clients - bridging communications and processes with key stakeholders
Take ownership of negotiation processes and ensure smooth sales process
Strengthen relationships with existing and prospect clients - identify business opportunities, cater to their pain points and translate them to the internal team for smooth delivery process
Collaborate with cross-functional teams within the company to achieve company objectives
Ensure healthy sales pipeline and construct sales strategies to achieve targets accordingly


The Successful Applicant

Requirements:

A Bachelor's degree in any relevant field, a Masters degree will be a plus
At least 4 years of working experience in Sales/BD or other client facing roles
Proven track record in closing deals with Enterprises across different industry verticals - Manufacturing, Oil & Gas, Consumer Goods, etc.
Self-motivated and driven - able to work autonomously and proactive in approaches
Excellent communication, presentation and negotiation skills in English and Indonesian
Fluent in English and Indonesian to collaborate with internal and external stakeholders

What's on Offer

Great scope for growth and exposure - working with world-class professionals both in Indonesia and Regional offices
Youthful working culture and attractive remuneration package

title: Business Development Manager
company_description: A Private Credit Bureau licensed by OJK that provides Comprehensive, Accurate, Wider Coverage, Customizable Insights & Real-Time Credit Data Information.
about_the_job:
Who We Are:

PT Kredit Biro Indonesia Jaya (Credit Bureau Indonesia, "CBI") as one of the private credit bureaus in Indonesia has been established since 2014 and obtained an operational license from Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) as Lembaga Pengelola Informasi Perkreditan (LPIP) in 2015.

In November 2021, after obtaining approval from OJK, CBI received additional capital from shareholders and appointed a new management team, which aims to provide new and leading-edge services and products. This new identity will also strengthen CBI's position as the "best-in-class, modern and innovative" credit bureau in Indonesia.

CBI is a trailblazer in the credit bureau industry, dedicated to fostering a culture of excellence and innovation. We believe in the power of a talented and diverse team to bring cutting-edge solutions to our clients and contribute to the overall success of the financial landscape in Indonesia.

Why Join Us:

Innovative Environment: Continuously investing in cutting-edge technologies, including the powerful realm of artificial intelligence, your role becomes a pivotal part of our journey into the dynamic and evolving landscape of financial services. Being part of our innovative environment is your gateway to an exciting and forward-thinking career 
Impactful Work: We offer more than just a job; we provide an opportunity to play a crucial role in shaping the financial future of individuals and businesses across the nation. As a licensed credit bureau, our commitment to accuracy, reliability, and timeliness sets the stage for impactful work 
Professional Development: We are committed to the growth of our employees. Join a team that encourages continuous learning and offers opportunities for career advancement. 
Collaborative Culture: Work in a collaborative and inclusive environment where your ideas are valued, and teamwork is key to achieving our goals. 

Current Opportunities:

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Business Development Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying business growth opportunities, building strategic partnerships, and driving revenue growth. As a key player in our organization, the Business Development Manager will leverage their expertise to develop and implement effective business strategies, foster client relationships, and contribute to the overall success of our company.

Responsibilities:

Build an active Enterprise sales pipeline in a timely manner, consisting of Banks, Multi finance companies, Fintech Lenders, and Cooperatives, which cover the target of NOC (number of clients) & revenue as set by management
Execute daily sales of client acquisition & client relationship activities to create continuous progress in the sales pipeline to onboard the Clients up to commercial go live
Able to independently reach-out and present CBI solutions to senior level/decision makers on the Client side
Cross-function coordination with the internal team to ensure a smooth Client onboarding process
Achieve business targets set by management
A consultative seller, connecting business problems to CBI solutions and well understanding of the general procurement process

Requirement:

Bachelor's degree from any major
More than 3 years experience in B2B sales for the position level of Senior Business Development Manager
Experiences working at Financial Institutions, Digital Solutions, Credit Bureau or Alternative Credit Score entities
Negotiation skills and client relationship management
Strong interpersonal and teamwork skills
Strong knowledge of risk management and wide networking in SaaS business
Excellent presentations skills problem-solving and analytical mind

Perks & Benefits:

Competitive compensation package
Private medical insurance
Free lunch provided with amazing choices
Work within an international environment that is both dynamic and forward-thinking
Promising career growth opportunities
Office situated near MRT station

title: Field Service & Construction Engineer (English speaker)
company_type: See recent hiring trends for persolkelly-id. Try Premium for IDR0
about_the_job:
Job Description

Studies the required safety rules of each plant and project, such as necessary submitted documents, safety induction and protection equipment.
Monitors and expedites for all operatives to keep required safety rules and environmental requirements during project.
Studies and reports to senior manager and customers the conditions and countermeasures in case accidents and/or incidents are happened in each project
Studies, reviews and coordinates with other groups regarding the output and quality desired by the customer for each project.
Prepares and takes review by senior manager for the quality assurance documents such as ‚ÄúWork Planning Documents‚Äù and ‚ÄúQuality Control Plan‚Äù of each work item in each project to meet desired output.
Reviews and analyzes drawings and documents related to site construction works.
Supervises and manages site based operatives, overseeing all aspects of their controlling quality of works, ensuring method statement and order fulfilment, cleanliness & tidiness, the use of plant and tools, upkeep of plant and facilities.
Reports to the senior manager the status of all on-going projects.
Prepares and organizes the manpower distribution plans for construction work implementation.
Follows-up with Supervisors/ Foremen their daily activities and manpower distributions.
Studies, reviews and coordinates with other groups regarding the schedule (the start and finish date, duration) desired by the customer for each project.
Prepares the overall and detailed work schedule planning and take a review for it by senior manager.
Monitors and expedites the actual schedule to meet its plans.
Reports to the senior manager the status of actual schedule.\
Prepares and organizes the project estimate cost for each work item for making the proposal to customers.
Studies and reviews the actual budget information of each construction project.
Monitors and expedites the actual project cost to meet its plans
Takes the necessary communications with relatives including site work contactors and customers, then expedites to meet desired outputs in all stages, Planning, Preparation, actual site work and Reporting.
Communicate with and report to customers regarding the on-going project status on time.
Reports to the senior manager the status of all problems encountered, immediate solutions and decisions.
Proposes the countermeasures to the customers in case of troubles in construction projects, and then discusses and makes agreements with customers and site work contractors, especially for cost and schedule impacts.
Monitors and expedites the actual work as countermeasures.
Reports to customers the results of countermeasures and remained concerns if any.
Coordinate the team for supporting customer's emergency unit shutdown in accordance with senior manager orders.

Requirements

Bachelor or higher degree from reputable university in related field
Minimum 8 years working experience in field work management for construction works and/or planned/unplanned outage works for Power Plants, Petrochemical Plants or Fertilizer Plants, etc. (knowledge of the steam turbine, boilers and BOPs is plus). 
Microsoft Office (Word and Excel) skills.
Excellent communication skills.
Fluency in English (Business level).
Knowledge of applicable codes & standards. (Especially ASME codes for power plants)
Available to travel for work with long term assignment.
